message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
I can be generous too. Meet me in the middle?
Time is ticking, Alice!  I'm meeting you closer to the middle, but this is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Try again.
Alright Alice, you drive a hard bargain. This is it, take it or leave it - we're running out of time!
Getting closer, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this. Don't let greed make us both losers!
